attributes.action: Free Wi-Fi Available at all NHS Hospitals and Clinics
attributes.additional_details:
By offering free Wi-Fi at all NHS hospitals and clinics this will allow patients the opportunity to:

a) communicate with relatives and friends unable to visit.

b) access information on their medical conditions.

c) find out the hospital or clinics results for treating patients

d) keep patients active mentally to promote their recovery

e) gives staff access to the internet for continued professional development and e-learning

F) all patients regardless of their financial background will have equal opportunities to use
